channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ

DescribePack: Inspection showed package of "ECOLAB SUPER TRUMP" to be wet and dented along bottom, with internal leakage from 1 of 4 items having a puncture on bottom of bottle. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be returned to shipper in plastic salvage drum, unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report X-2023110990
item.description:
Report X-2023110990

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: IT APPEARS THE SHIPMENT WAS REMOVED FROM SYSTEM FLOW, DUE TO EXTERNAL CARTON BEING TORN AND WET DURING THE DAY SORT. DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS DURING THE TWILIGHT SHIFT 2X5 LITERS (PLASTIC BOTTLES) RAPICIDE PA HIGH LEVEL DISINFECTANT PART A AND 2X5 LITERS (PLASTIC BOTTLES) RAPICIDE PA HIGH LEVEL DISINFECTANT PART B ONE OF THE BOTTLES OF PART A HAD A PUNCTURE HOLE WHICH CAUSED 10% LEAKAGE FROM THE BOTTLE. WHICH ALSO CAUSED DAMAGE TO THE OUTER PACKAGING AS WELL. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023110979
item.description:
Report X-2023110979

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the sunrise sort, the plastic bottles arrived at the hazmat cage in a tote. Original packaging was and is missing and the 4 plastic bottles containing Diversey Suma Dip Liquid Presoak were soiled barely readable. All that was recovered was a relabel and the bottles. 3 of the 4 bottles seem to have leaked out some product all missing different amounts of product. Bottles wee placed into a salvage drum to await disposition. DescribePack: The package failure seems to have been from a several loose caps causing 3 of 4 bottles to leak out all different amounts of product. The first bottle, Leaked out almost half a gallon of the liquid. The second bottle, leaked out about half a cup. The third bottle leaked out about a cup. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The bottles were closed tightly and placed into salvage drum upright to stop any further leakage.

item.title: Report X-2023110934
item.description:
Report X-2023110934

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-10
  • City: DOVER
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found on van line on 11/10 appearing mostly undamaged but with small paint leak or smear on top closure. Package was isolated from sort by line manager for inspection by QA. As box is an undeclared hazmat with no markings on box, it was placed in black non-hazmat bin with plain plastic liner and brought to QA for inspection. QA was unable to inspect package on 11/10 and held box for inspection overnight. On 11/11, package was inspected and discovered to be an undeclared hazmat. Package was then placed in a red hazmat bin with hazmat liner. DescribePack: Outer package appears undamaged, with no punctures or tears on box, but with a small amount of paint leaking from edge of top closure. Leak almost fully contained inside package. Package contains 2 paint cans; 1 can has been dented, pushing lid up and allowing leak. Other can appears undamaged. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Leak contained almost fully inside box and did not affect other packages. Box was first placed in a plain black bin with plain plastic liner and brought to QA for inspection; when package was discovered to be an undeclared hazmat, it was moved into a red hazmat bin with hazmat bag liner.

DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS DURING THE TWILIGHT SHIFT 2X5 LITERS (PLASTIC BOTTLES) RAPICIDE PA HIGH LEVEL DISINFECTANT PART A AND 2X5 LITERS (PLASTIC BOTTLES) RAPICIDE PA HIGH LEVEL DISINFECTANT PART B AND PART A EACH HAD LOOSE CAPS CAUSING LEAKAGING ALLOWING 8 OUNCES OF SPILLAGE FROM EACH BOTTLE. item.title: Report X-2023110628
item.description:
Report X-2023110628

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-07T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-31
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the sunrise sort, the package arrived at the hazmat cage with stains. Upon inspection, 1 of 4 glass bottles containing Acetonitrile was found cracked and leaked out. The contents were placed into a salvage drum to await disposition. DescribePack: The package failure was due to the glass bottle cracking and leaking out, most likely due to a conveyer mishap when being unloaded. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: The remaining glass bottles were secured in a salvage drum to avoid breakage to the unbroken bottles. the broken glass will be disposed of properly.

item.title: Report X-2023110599
item.description:
Report X-2023110599

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-07T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-30
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the day sort, the package arrived at the hazmat cage with orange stains. Upon inspection, a plastic bottle containing Epredia Orange G-6 was found with a loose cap causing some leakage. Items were placed in a salvage drum to await disposition. DescribePack: Package failure was due to a loose cap with no seal causing a leakage of about 1/4 of the solution. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately inspected and lids were secure tightly.

item.title: Report X-2023110598
item.description:
Report X-2023110598

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-07T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-30
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the day sort, the package arrived at the hazmat cage with the closures open and previous wet conditions. Upon inspection, 1 of 4 of the plastic bottles containing "Ethyl Alcohol" was found with a loose cap and about almost half of the reagent leaked out. Items were placed into a salvage drum to await disposition. DescribePack: The package failure was due to a loose cap with no seal causing almost half of the ethyl alcohol reagent to leak out. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately inspected, Lids on the bottles were secured tight, and the contents were placed into a salvage drum upright to await disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023110158
item.description:
Report X-2023110158

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-01T18:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-21
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE IN A TOTE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING ISOPROPY ALCOHOL WAS FOUND WITH 1 OF THE BOTTLES DAMAGED. THE BOTTLE WAS SLIGHTY LEAKED OUT. THEY WERE HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURNED TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO THE CAP BEING LOOSE CAUSING 1 BOTTLE OF ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL TO BE DAMAGED. ( LEAKING). DurationRel: 8 and MitigateEffect: THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALAVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023110157
item.description:
Report X-2023110157

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-01T18:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-21
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION THE BOX CONTAINING ACETONE WAS FOUND WITH ONE OF THE BOTTLES DAMAGED. ONE CRACKED CAUSING IT TO BE LEAKED OUT. THEY WERE HURRIEDLY PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURNED TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE WAS DUE TO ONE OF THE BOTTLED BEING CRACKED CAUSING THE PACKAGE OF ACETONE TO BE DAMAGED. DurationRel: 8 and MitigateEffect: THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALAVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.
